name: MageSlayer (itch)
description:
Control a knight, trapped inside a castle, defeating endlessly respawning Firemages. Dodge their attacks, slice them open with your sword or let them shoot fireballs at each other! Take as many of those mages with you as you can!

Controls: 

WASD or the arrowkeys to move

Left click to stab with your sword

Right click to block with your shield

Spacebar to restart when you get killed. 

Aim for the Highscore!

Credits: 

Art & Sound: Nathan Winter

Programming: Paul Klockenbrink
